title: Ground News - Warning with 'yellow code' with 15 from Meteorology! Heavy rain and storms are coming! Weather in Ayia il on March 22, 2024
text:
Summary by Aydınlık According to the latest assessments made by the General Directorate of Meteorology: It is estimated that the whole country will be partly cloudy and partly cloudy, with the exception of the west of Marmara , the coastal Aegean and the environs of Antalya and Manisa. Here is the weather forecast in the province on March 22, 2024... Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
